name: Discord - Maximize Chat
description: This theme is designed to maximize the chat window while keeping everything accessible and with minimal style changes.
additional_info:
What does it do:
- Allows you to set a custom font for the entire page (must be a font installed on your computer)
- Allows you to zoom the chat area independent of the rest of the window
- Makes the server list smaller 
- Moves the timestamp to the right of the chat line
- Collapses the channel list (which will display when you hover over it)
